navigation

Class Navigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • navigation.Pilot
      • navigation.Navigator

  • public class Navigator
extends Pilot
    Set a path in the wavefront grid and navigate tile per tile to destination
    Author:
    Michael

    • Method Detail

      • navigateTo

        public void navigateTo(double destX,
              double destY)
        Navigate to the center of a tile
        Parameters:
        destX - X coordinate of the center of destination tile in cm. Must be multiple of 15 but not multiple of 30
        destY - Y coordinate of the center of destination tile in cm. Must be multiple of 15 but not multiple of 30

      • setPath

        public int[][] setPath(double destX,
              double destY)
        Set a path given the current coordinates and new destination on a grid map
        Parameters:
        destX - X coordinate of center of destination tile in cm. Must be multiple of 15 but not multiple of 30
        destY - Y coordinate of center of destination tile in cm. Must be multiple of 15 but not multiple of 30
        Returns:
        The wavefront grid, a 2D array of integers representing path to follow, the robot will follow the values in decreasing order

      • navigatePath

        public void navigatePath(int[][] grid)
        Navigate the path following the values of the wavefront grid in decreasing order
        Parameters:
        grid - The wavefront grid containing the path

      • destX

        public static double destX(int destJ)
        Converts the J component of a tile form a wavefront grid into the X coordinate of the center of the tile
        Parameters:
        destJ - The J component of a tile in a the wavefront grid
        Returns:
        The X coordinate of the center of the destination tile

      • destY

        public static double destY(int destI)
        Converts the I component of a tile form a wavefront grid into the Y coordinate of the center of the tile
        Parameters:
        destI - The I component of a tile in a the wavefront grid
        Returns:
        The Y coordinate of the center of the destination tile
